components: SERVICE BRAKES, HYDRAULIC,ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING
summary: 1999 MALIBU WITH ENGING COOLING PROBLEMS AND FAN DOES NOT WORK ON POSITION 1 AND 2.  HAD TO HAVE INTAKE GASKET REPLACED AND ONE MONTH LATER ENTIRE ENGINE WENT OUT AND HAD TO BE REPLACED.  I REALLY LIKE MY MALIBU, BUT HATE THE PROBLEMS THAT I HAVE HAD.  I, TOO, HAVE HAD BRAKE PROBLEMS AND COOLANT LEAKAGE PROBLEMS.*AK
